item.title: Create FB Ad videos from stock videos + videos that I'll provide - Upwork
item.description:
Final deliverable: 5 video ads of under 1 minute each with voiceover, subtitles, and the brand logo somewhere on the video.

Each video should have a strong hook that intrigues viewers to continue watching. They should be appealing to the Indian audience and should be in English (minimal usage of Hindi in voiceover may be there).

The videos would be about a specific product (The Indian Posture Corrector) as seen on: https://indianpostureguru.com/

It should be noted that the videos should not be pushy and must be entertaining to watch till the end. Add "redred" to your message if you've read the description to the end.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 16, 2024 07:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Editing
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Video Clipper - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled TikTok video clipper to join our team. As a TikTok video clipper, you will be responsible for editing and creating engaging video content for our social media platforms. REQUIRED-  need 5 video clips per hour and to be submitted in the google drive. You will need to have a deep understanding of the TikTok platform, trends, and audience preferences. Your main tasks will include trimming and cropping videos, adding captions and subtitles, and enhancing the overall visual appeal. The ideal candidate should have excellent video editing skills, a creative mindset, and an eye for detail. If you are passionate about creating viral TikTok content and have a strong portfolio of successful projects, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 07:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Music Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Music Video
Country: United States

item.title: Leonardo AI consistent character Video Tutorial - Upwork
item.description:
When applying please provide:
- Your quote.
- How long this will take you to complete.
- Examples of other work you have done.

Job description:
Hi, I need someone who is passionate about AI image generation to create a video tutorial on how to use Leonardo AI to get consistent characters.

Step 1: Send me the video script for the tutorial.

Step 2: I will provide any needed feedback for you to make edits.

Step 3: I will get a voice over recorded based on your script. I will send you the voiceover.

Step 4: You will create the tutorial by recording your screen and using the voice over I sent you.

Requirements:
- The video needs to be 1080p or 4k.
- No fancy editing.
- Just a recording of the screen. It needs to be a clean and clear tutorial without showing lots of icons, files, folders that don't have anything to do with the tutorial or the taskbar.
- No highlighting around the cursor.
- No music, no other audio apart from the voice over I send you.

Please let me know:
- Your quote.
- How long this will take you to complete.
- Examples of other work you have done.

Thank you and looking forward to working with you!


Posted On: June 16, 2024 06:59 UTC
Category: AI Image Generation & Editing
Skills:AI Image Generation, Leonardo Ai, Explainer Video, Video Editing
Skills: AI Image Generation, Leonardo Ai, Explainer Video, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video editor needed for a faceless basketball documentary YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
The documentary style will be focused on basketball.

Here is an example of the style I’m interested in. Please apply only if you can replicate this style of editing.

https://youtu.be/EaLkOM3XTBM?si=je-nD2PXYRt7-1dX
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v9SBWVNfsaM

The editing style needs be in a very similar format as the above example

•Videos need to be 12–20 minutes in duration.
•Clips, will need to be sourced by you


I’m looking for someone with the following qualities:
•Fast turnaround times 4-5 days
•Fast response times
•Good understanding of storytelling and YouTube  retention.
• An excellent understanding of YouTube copyright policy.

* You significantly improve your chance of being hired if you provide samples of your documentary videos.




Budget: $110
Posted On: June 16, 2024 06:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Create a ComfyUI Video Tutorial - Upwork
item.description:
When applying please provide:
- Your quote.
- How long this will take you to complete.
- Examples of other work you have done.

Job description:
Hi, I need someone to create a video tutorial on ComfyUI. What it is and detailed overview with examples of how to use it, how to know what components to use etc so that an absolute beginner can go from having no idea to being able to confidently use ComfyUI,

Step 1: Send me the video script for the tutorial.

Step 2: I will provide any needed feedback for you to make edits.

Step 3: I will get a voice over recorded based on your script. I will send you the voiceover.

Step 4: You will create the tutorial by recording your screen and using the voice over I sent you.

Requirements:
- The video needs to be 1080p or 4k.
- No fancy editing.
- Just a recording of the screen. It needs to be a clean and clear tutorial without showing lots of icons, files, folders that don't have anything to do with the tutorial or the taskbar.
- No highlighting around the cursor.
- No music, no other audio apart from the voice over I send you.

Please let me know:
- Your quote.
- How long this will take you to complete.
- Examples of other work you have done.

Thank you and looking forward to working with you!


Posted On: June 16, 2024 06:46 UTC
Category: AI Image Generation & Editing
Skills:AI Image Generation, Stable Diffusion, Explainer Video, Video Editing
Skills: AI Image Generation, Stable Diffusion, Explainer Video, Video Editing

item.title: Looking for a FRENCH Translator! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

PLEASE ONLY APPLY IF YOU ARE FLUENT IN ENGLISH & FRENCH LANGUAGES.

We need someone that can copy-paste translate our YouTube scripts + translate the titles to 3 of our YouTube channels for each video, and generate new audio files with Elevenlabs!

We need someone that has a basic to advance skill in video editing.

You need to make sure that the titles sounds good and native in the languages you translate to so they can perform well! The translated audio files also need to sound good so people in other languages can enjoy them 🙌

We are using YouTubes new feature and want to expand to multiple languages to get bigger reach

There will be about 15-20 titles & scripts per week that needs to be translated into all of these 4 languages

You will be using Google translate or ChatGPT for translation and
Elevenlabs to generate the audio files, we also need you to cut up the files so they match the video length!

IMPORTANT:
It's great if you can use audio or editing programs to adjust the length of the generations of AI text to speech. It needs to match the length of the videos on YouTube to be compatible!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 16, 2024 06:28 UTC
Category: Manual Transcription
Skills:English, French, Translation, Video Editing
Skills: English, French, Translation, Video Editing
Country: Sweden
click to apply
